abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column notes that coalition of legal groups and labor advocates is set to introduce bill calling for changes in New York law that will help workers cheated out of wages to collect what they are owed; collection can be made difficult by companies that are skilled at shifting or hiding their assets.
lead_paragraph: A report to be released next week calls for legal changes aimed at giving workers a fighting chance to actually receive stolen wages awarded by authorities.

headline.main: Awarded Stolen Wages, Workers Struggle to Collect
headline.print_headline: Awarded Stolen Wages, Workers Struggle to Collect

snippet: A report to be released next week calls for legal changes aimed at giving workers a fighting chance to actually receive stolen wages awarded by authorities.
